items.question: What is the pricing model?
items.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans tailored to your business needs.

items.question: How can I get support?
items.answer: Our support team is available 24/7 via email, chat, and phone.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time without any penalties.

items.question: Is there a free trial available?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for you to explore our features.
